name: PreciousPreciousCaffeine
title: Precious, precious caffeine
author: raudorn
description:
Adds product and research chains to produce coffee, which boosts manual crafting and running speed.

You start with the basic production of coffee berries and work through the technologies up to enjoy a nice mug of coffee. There are also more products to be derived from the humble coffee plant, that might aid you in your goals.
